nodes.name: Mama Turtle Room Door (to Fish Tank)

runways.name: Base Runway - Mama Turtle Room Door (to Fish Tank)

obstacles.name: Get on top of the Grapple Block

strats.name: Grapple
note: To get out of the water, ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.
If Mama Turtle is in her starting location, stand on the rightmost side of her to be aligned below the grapple block.
With a miss, if you havent moved horizontally, simply fall straight down to land safely back on to her.

strats.name: Space Jump
strats.note: To get out of the water, ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.

strats.name: Jump into IBJ
note: Ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.
Once out of the water, jump into an IBJ.
With a miss, if you havent moved horizontally, simply fall straight down to land safely back on Mama Turtle.

strats.name: Mama Turtle Wall Jump Bomb Boost
note: Starting from the top left ledge, wall jump to place a bomb or Power Bomb just below and to the right of the bottom left plant on the wall.
Use the bomb to boost you towards the item, then unmorph to reduce your fall speed and barely reach the item.

strats.name: Spring Ball Jump
note: Ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.
With a fail, if you havent moved horizontally, simply fall straight down to land safely back on Mama Turtle.

strats.name: Tricky Speed Hi Jump
note: To get out of the water, ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.
Briefly run on the top ledge on either side (left is slightly easier) then jump and wall jump on the grapple block.

strats.name: Mama Turtle Springwall
strats.note: To get out of the water, ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.
strats.devNote: FIXME: It is possible to do this without canResetFallSpeed, but with a spring fling. A spring ball jump midair could be added, which combined with a spring fling can get onto the platform.

strats.name: Mama Turtle Insane Walljump
note: Have to do a running stationary spinjump from a precise spot, to do a CWJ with slightly more speed off the wall one tile further out.
This makes it possible to just barely walljump off the grapple block.

strats.name: Suitless Water Shinecharge
strats.devNote: Can save an additional 4 energy with HiJump, and a bit more excess frames if not getting on top of the block to go to 2.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph - Let Mama Turtle Sleep
note: Get into position as close to the center of the room as possible while not being too close to any baby turtles.
Start an IBJ without hiting any baby turtles otherwhise Mama Turtle will wake up.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph - Wake Mama Turtle
note: Place a bomb next to one of the baby turtles, then use spring ball to get on Mama Turtle's back.
Start an IBJ above the waterline to get to the item.

strats.name: Ride Mama Turtle
strats.note: Ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.

strats.name: Grapple
note: Ride Mama Turtle. To avoid getting hit, shoot one of her babies to wake her up, then quickly get on her back.
If Mama Turtle is in her starting location, stand on the rightmost side of her to be aligned below the grapple block.
With a miss, if you havent moved horizontally, simply fall straight down to land safely back on to her.

strats.name: Ride Mama Turtle on the Right
strats.note: Requires getting back on Mama Turtle while she is at the right.

strats.name: Suitless Water Shinecharge
strats.note: Requires a little more than 1 tile in the adjacent room.
strats.devNote: Can save an additional 3 energy with HiJump.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph - Let Mama Turtle Sleep
strats.note: IBJ up a bit, then bomb over Mama Turtle and her babies to prevent her from waking. Then IBJ to the high right ledge before exiting g-mode.

strats.name: Suitless Back on the Back
strats.note: Get back on Mama Turtles back, then jump to the left at the top.

strats.name: Suitless Mama is Sleeping
strats.note: This is assuming Mama Turtle is still sleeping.
